channel.title: Wtf
channel.description:
Blitz World
SO i tried to add bank all button and this is what i get even added the buttons to my cahce with toms cache help me please
BTW used this topic http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/569332-pi-deposit-all-bank-interface-fixed-some-clients.html
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method119(client.java:9318) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:9008) at client.method146(client.java:12084) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8233) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8943) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4700) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @jackfrost890 jackfrost890
item.description:
@jackfrost890 wrote:

Rsinterface
http://pastebin.com/TKWkuS0E

/**
* Open bank
**/
public void openUpBank(){
synchronized© {
if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) {
c.getItems().resetItems(5064);
c.getItems().rearrangeBank();
c.getItems().resetBank();
c.getItems().resetTempItems();
c.getOutStream().createFrame(248);
c.getOutStream().writeWordA(23000);
c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063);
c.flushOutStream();
}
}
}

Read full topic
